# Look at Phenotypes



```{r}
phenos <- fread("../output/Simulate_Phenotypes/SimpleGrid/E3/C1/h2-0/env-10/genos-gwas_common.phenos.txt")
phenos <- inner_join(phenos, pops)
plot(phenos$Lat,phenos$pheno_strat)

```







```{r}
pgs <- fread("~/polygenic_adaptation_stratification/output/PRS/SimpleGrid/E3/C1/h2-0/env-10/PGS.txt")
pops <- fread("~/polygenic_adaptation_stratification/output/Simulate_Genotypes/SimpleGrid/E3/genos.pop")
colnames(pops) <- c("IID", "#FID", "Pop", "Lat", "Long")

df <- inner_join(pgs, pops)
plot(df$Lat, df$c)
```
